XGetVisualInfo

public X11.XVisualInfo XGetVisualInfo(Pointer display,
                                      int vinfo_mask,
                                      X11.XVisualInfo vinfo_template,
                                      IntByReference nitems_return)
Returns an array of X11.XVisualInfo which must be freed by XFree(com.sun.jna.Pointer). Use toArray(new XVisualInfo[nitems_return.getValue()] to obtain the array.
